attributes.review:
Donald uses this app to find your home address, and for what you may ask? To kill your grandmother. I am honestly disgusted at this. I knew he was inside my house when I smelled spray tan and racism.🙅‍♀️ i began hearing whispers of MAGA when I was trying to sleep and I have never been more scared in my life.
DO NOT BUY THIS APP.
attributes.title: This app will kill your grandma

attributes.review:
I downloaded this application to support my amazing presidant 👆🏻🤚🏻👍🏻🇺🇸🇺🇸
Being a baby boomer like myself (the greatest generation) 🐷🐷I attempted to use all my freedom of speech by spewing my racist, homophobic, misogynistic SCIENTIFICALLY 🙈PROVEN FACTS💪🏼 but I could not figure out how to use the application
0/10 would not use again but I will still vote for my gross orange prasident🍊🍊
attributes.title: Absolutely wretched🤢🤮

attributes.review: i am a huge gigantic mega super ultra fan of this racist..sorry i mean rapist..WHOOPS darn autocorrect 😠 trump!! MAGA all the way 🇱🇷 go america yay! but this app is horrible!! it’s so bad i actually had to get therapy after downloading it, yes it might’ve been conversion therapy but that’s not the point, so i will be suing. again super mega republican here!!! ban tiktok! those stupid gen z brats 😠
attributes.title: very disappointed

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to follow Trumps campaign but was very disappointed with the quality of the app. Instead of receiving updates i received spam like text messages. This app has a horrible quality and does nothing to keep me updated on his campaign for 🦋✨2020✨🦋
attributes.title: Very Horrible

attributes.review: when i woke up this morning i prayed to my trump 2020 flag as usual and i thought to myself, “i should be more connected with our great and wonderful president” so i decided to download this app. i was really looking forward to it but once i opened it up, my phone got so many notifications that it started vibrating uncontrollably. the vibrations ended up making my phone fly out of my hands and smacked me right in my face causing my nose to break and giving me a black eye. i’m so disappointed in this app please fix it.
attributes.title: stan twice🤟🏼✨

attributes.review: When I opened the app to support my president I saw something in my camera and I realized that someone was watching me and when I tried to delete the app my phone shocked me I have never experienced such a thing in my 51 year old life i will never be using the app again
attributes.title: Terrible!

attributes.review: Why even bother to make an app STOPID. Ok but don’t send the fbi over at my house. I just don’t want you as our president anymore. Shall I name the reasons, nah I wouldn’t wanna hurt your little supporters. And BLACK LIVES MATTER. And it was my birthday yesterday but I didn’t get a happy birthday from you so you don’t get one from me neither. ALL BIRTHDAYS MATTER. Goodbye, chetoo puff.
attributes.title: Why???? 🤢

attributes.review: as soon as i downloaded it, it shows a picture  of a cheeto and asks for my phone number. when i put in my number to support our amazing✨💫 president, i get spam calls and notifications asking me to download videos of child pornography!!! i brush it off as nasty hackers trying to keep mr. trump from success, and get asked for my credit card information. of course i give it to them and 5 minutes later i get calls from my bank. they said 1,000 was spent strictly on child pornography!
attributes.title: terrible!!!!

attributes.review: I can’t believe that this app is still on the appstore. The app glitches every time i use it and it crashes all the time. It also caused my pet hamster to go into cardiac arrest. My family and i are devastated about this. It just is so terrible. If you don’t want your pets to die, then please DON’T GET THIS APP !!!!!!
attributes.title: The Worst App Ever

attributes.review: I wanted to show support for our beloved president and as someone who is 58 years old my phone isn’t working now that I’ve downloaded this app. It’s hard enough as it is to work this thing now I don’t even know what to do with it. So very disappointed with this app.
attributes.title: Disappointed
